about_the_game:
Feedback is well appreciated, as I intend to GROW the game over time and add a ton of content and emergent behaviors!


70+ Powerups, 20+ Enemy kinds, some with special behaviors.

Featuring emergent behaviors and build strategies like:
- Full Core builds;
- Giant Agglomerates;
- Full shields build;
- Full magnetic builds;
- Full aiming builds;
- Full directional builds;
- Experiment and create hybrids to see what works best for you;

Pixel Survivor is a hypnotic pixel-based survivor rogue-lite, where you build your contraption by picking up pixel pieces while firing tons of bullets and dodging swarms of enemies.

During the game, you individually pick and place each new pixel, by moving your malformed creature into it! Each new pixel has a special power and can help you survive the relentless waves of enemies!

Some blocks are offensive, others are defensive! Some will simply help you define the structure of your abomination!

After growing a certain amount, you'll be able to get new abilities, and then all over again in an addicting never-ending cycle!

How much will you survive?
